Connect
Reading

Brand Design, Logo, Icons, Website, Animation And Copywritting


Sometimes we are called not to create new brand identities for new businesses and start ups but to help elevate and rebrand an already established corporate charity. Connect Reading wanted their branding to stray away from the typical corporate look and portray a more fun, modern and lively face while still maintaining an air of professionalism. We designed their identity to be bold, bright, fun and inviting. The entire brand overhaul spanned from logos, slogans, copy-write, website, animation videos, social media templates, print material and stationery; helping give this charity a breath of fresh air and a new lease of life.
